com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.elements
Class Home

java.lang.Object
  com.rattat.micro.graphics.Layer
      com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.elements.Home

public class Home
extends Layer

The component of the frogger board that is at the top and has gaps where the player trys to get a frog into.

Author:
william@rattat.com
